AD_TAB.NAME: Approval Second Instance
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Create a purchase order and process it when ready.
AD_TAB.HELP: Purchase orders can be created and booked in the header section of the purchase order window.
AD_TAB.WHERECLAUSE: C_Order.IsSOTrx='N' AND C_Order.em_sfb_budget_area_id IN ( select sfb_budget_area_id from sfb_budget_user_area where ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@)
AD_TAB.HQLWHERECLAUSE: e.salesTransaction=false AND e.transactionDocument.return=false AND e.sfbBudgetArea IN (select area from sfb_budget_user_area as ua where ua.userContact.id = @#AD_User_ID@) AND e.id IN (select order.id from ssfw_order_approval as oa where oa.approver2ndLevel.id=(select businessPartner.id from ADUser where id=@#AD_User_ID@) AND oa.approval1=true AND oa.approval2=false)

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.HELP: Shows the total amount expected to be paid upon order booking as well as the amount/s pre-paid or paid against the invoice/s for the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Tax
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Edit taxes applied to your order.
AD_TAB.HELP: Summarized purchase order tax related information is shown in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Tax
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Edit taxes applied to your order.
AD_TAB.HELP: Summarized purchase order tax related information is shown in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Discounts and Promotions
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: View applied Discounts and Promotions for each line.
AD_TAB.HELP: View applied Discounts and Promotions for each line.

AD_TAB.NAME: Line Tax
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Taxes related to the order line.
AD_TAB.HELP: For each purchase order line, Openbravo automatically populates the line tax related information in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Accounting dimension
AD_TAB.HELP: Accounting Dimension

AD_TAB.NAME: Accounting dimension
AD_TAB.HELP: Accounting Dimension

AD_TAB.NAME: Prereserved Qty
AD_TAB.HELP: Relation of Reservations where the Purchase Order line has been used as prereservation.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.HELP: Shows the total amount expected to be paid upon order booking as well as the amount/s pre-paid or paid against the invoice/s for the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Discounts and Promotions
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: View applied Discounts and Promotions for each line.
AD_TAB.HELP: View applied Discounts and Promotions for each line.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.HELP: Displays the details of the payments (pre-payments or regular payments) made for the order or for the invoice/s of the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Line Tax
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Taxes related to the order line.
AD_TAB.HELP: For each purchase order line, Openbravo automatically populates the line tax related information in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Basic Discounts
AD_TAB.HELP: Lists information about discounts automatically applied based on the supplier configuration and / or manually entered for the purchase order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Lines
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Add products to be included in your purchase order. Each product is added by creating a line.
AD_TAB.HELP: Once the purchase order header has been properly filled in and saved, each purchase order line can be created in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Basic Discounts
AD_TAB.HELP: Lists information about discounts automatically applied based on the supplier configuration and / or manually entered for the purchase order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Create an obligation for accounting to pay for all or part of your purchase order amount in advance.
AD_TAB.HELP: Create an obligation for accounting to pay for all or part of your purchase order amount in advance.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.HELP: Displays the details of the payments (pre-payments or regular payments) made for the order or for the invoice/s of the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Lines
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Add products to be included in your purchase order. Each product is added by creating a line.
AD_TAB.HELP: Once the purchase order header has been properly filled in and saved, each purchase order line can be created in this tab.

AD_TAB.NAME: Approval First Instance
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Create a purchase order and process it when ready.
AD_TAB.HELP: Purchase orders can be created and booked in the header section of the purchase order window.
AD_TAB.WHERECLAUSE: C_Order.IsSOTrx='N' AND C_Order.em_sfb_budget_area_id IN ( select sfb_budget_area_id from sfb_budget_user_area where ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@)
AD_TAB.HQLWHERECLAUSE: e.salesTransaction=false AND e.transactionDocument.return=false AND e.sfbBudgetArea IN (select area from sfb_budget_user_area as ua where ua.userContact.id = @#AD_User_ID@) AND e.id IN (select order.id from ssfw_order_approval as oa where oa.approver1stLevel.id=(select businessPartner.id from ADUser where id=@#AD_User_ID@) AND oa.approval1=false)

AD_TAB.NAME: Prereserved Qty
AD_TAB.HELP: Relation of Reservations where the Purchase Order line has been used as prereservation.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Create an obligation for accounting to pay for all or part of your purchase order amount in advance.
